required.name: SPLIT_NAME
required.description: A name of a subset we want to use. This name is used to index the dataset object created from load_dataset to retrieve a specific subset of its data

required.name: FEATURE_NAME
required.description: A name of a feature/attribute we want to use. This name is used to index the subset of data to retrieve a specific feature obtained from each datapoint in the subset

optional.name: USE_OPUS_MODEL
optional.description: A flag that defines whether we want to use additional env vars (OPUS_SRC_LANG, OPUS_DST_LANG) to build a new model name that is further used to retrieve the model from HuggingFace. Default value: false

optional.name: OPUS_SRC_LANG
optional.description: Two letter code for a source language that we want to translate text from. This variable is only read when USE_OPUS_MODEL is set to true

optional.name: OPUS_DST_LANG
optional.description: Two letter code for a destination language that we want to translate text to. This variable is only read when USE_OPUS_MODEL is set to true

optional.name: NUM_DATAPOINTS_TO_TRANSLATE
optional.description: Number of datapoints we want to apply the translation task to. If not specified, we translate the entire subset of data

optional.name: BATCH_SIZE
optional.description: Size of a batch that is used to compute translations in parallel. Default value: 8.

optional.name: HF_MODEL
optional.description: A name of the HuggingFace model we wish to use instead using either the one chosen via AIoD or the models from Opus model family (USE_OPUS_MODEL). This environment variable is overwritten with the Opus model if you specify all the environment variables necessary for choosing the specific Opus model (USE_OPUS_MODEL, OPUS_SRC_LANG, OPUS_DST_LANG)
